_comment: Multi-angle character reference workflow. Generates 4 views (front, 3/4, profile, back) as separate images. This file documents the workflow structure â€” actual generation is done programmatically in panel_generator.py via build_sdxl_workflow() called 4 times.

inputs.text: character reference, [VISUAL_DESCRIPTION], [VIEW_DIRECTION], standing pose, upper body and face clearly visible, simple white background, [STYLE] art style, clean lines, high detail, professional character design, neutral expression, studio lighting, centered composition, no text, no letters, no words

bad quality, worst quality, low quality, blurry, deformed, disfigured, mutation, extra limbs, watermark, text, words, letters, lettering, multiple views, turnaround, multiple poses, split image, collage, busy background, complex background, jpeg artifacts, poorly drawn, amateur, ugly, duplicate
